columns.name: arn
columns.description: Amazon Resource Name associated with the backup.

columns.name: table_name
columns.description: Unique identifier for the table to which backup belongs.

columns.name: table_arn
columns.description: Name of the table to which backup belongs.

columns.name: table_id
columns.description: ARN associated with the table to which backup belongs.

columns.name: backup_status
columns.description: Current status of the backup. Backup can be in one of the following states: CREATING, ACTIVE, DELETED.

columns.name: backup_creation_datetime
columns.description: Time at which the backup was created.

columns.name: backup_expiry_datetime
columns.description: Time at which the automatic on-demand backup created by DynamoDB will expire.

columns.name: backup_size_bytes
columns.description: Size of the backup in bytes.
